divs: sighting detailsit was 1968i was 14, a well-mannered teenager, didn92t drink or run around. i was a live in babysitter for the summer in myhometown of willamina, oregon. i lived with a couple and their daughter in atwo-story duplex on the outskirts of town. my bedroom was upstairsthe head of the twin size bed was up against the window, the window faced thehills and countryside. i went upstairs to my room around 11:00 pm that night, iwasnt tired yet, so i laid on my bed, in the dark, looking up at the beautifulstar filled sky, it was very warm and my window was wide open. i lay therewide-awake for about an hour, i know because i glanced at the clock again, itwas around midnight, i still wasn92t sleepy. the sky was clear and calm, no moon in sight. as i continued lookingup to the sky an extreme bright white light shot down from the sky, it camedirectly through the open window, and in an instant filled the room and in ablinding light that left as quickly as it came. this was not lightningit didn92t light up the ground or hillside, just my room, it came from far up in thesky not from the gentle slooping hills behind the duplex. i had seen the lightcome down and leave in a flashi was fully awake, but not afraid. i looked at the clock again and it was now3:00 am, three hours had passed in less than a second. i knew i hadn92t dreamt it, its as clear to me today as if it had just happened. i nevertold anyone about it, things like that weren92t talked about then, who would believe me? it wasnt long after that i noticedthat my eyes were and still are very sensitive to light. when i was 16 i drovemy mother to salem or about 25 miles away, i had forgotten my sunglasses, thesun was very hard on my eyes and by the time i got home my eyes were nearlyswollen completely shut. that year i dropped out of school and was married atsixteen. about a year and a half later i had a miscarriage, at that time theyfound that i had a double uterus, i was told at the time that it was very rare,a few months later i had another miscarriage and was told that i probably wouldnot be able to have children. however, i did conceive again and gave birth to mydaughter in october of 1972. i thought about that night every now and then butit wasn92t until several years later that it shook me up. in 1988 i saw this newsstory\interview on tv regarding ufos and abductions, the show interviewed someof the so called abductees, some of the females that said they had beenabducted, said that they had various problems with their female organs, wasunable to conceive, had multiple miscarriages etc., some of the women reportedhaving a double uterus like mine. anyway it wasnt until that time that i wasable to talk to anyone about that night, and then to only a select few. iveoften wondered what happened during those three hours that passed in a flash oflight or maybe i don92t want to know, would it change my life, i doubt it. my experience seems sominor compared to other sightings and abductions, and i don92t remember anything of those three hours i lost. can you tell me if this sametype of thing has been reported before? thank you, margo
Summary: Blinding Flash of White Light from Sky Fills Room
